import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { Form, Row, Col, Button, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Header, { HeaderLeft, HeaderCenter, HeaderRight } from '../../components/Dealer/Header'; import { IconArrowLeft, IconCustomerEdit, iconNotify, IconSmallArrowRight, iconPaid } from '../../assets/images'; import { changeCustomer } from '../../redux/actions/customer'; import { getCustomerById, sendPreapproval } from '../../redux/actions/customers'; class CustomerDetail extends Component { state = { modalShow: false, commentBoxShow: false } async componentDidMount() { const id = this.props.match.params.id; this.props.getCustomerById(id); } handleArrowBack = () => { this.props.history.goBack(); } handlePreApprovalClick = async () => { const result = await this.props.sendPreapproval(this.props.customer.data.id); if (result) { this.setState({ modalShow: true }); } } handleCommentClick = () => { this.setState({ commentBoxShow: !this.state.commentBoxShow }) } handleModalClose = () => { this.setState({ modalShow: false }); } handleGenerateOrderClick = () => { const customer = this.props.customer.data; this.props.changeCustomer({ order_type: 2, main_app: { name: customer.name, email: customer.email, dobY: customer.dobY, dobM: customer.dobM, dobD: customer.dobD, ssn: customer.ssn, dl: customer.dl, nod: customer.nod, cell_phone: customer.cell_phone, home_phone: customer.home_phone, street: customer.street, city: customer.city, state: customer.state, zip: customer.zip, yt1: "", own_or_rent: "", present_employer: "", yt2: "", job_title: "", employer_phone: "", monthly_income: "", additional_income: "", source: "", landlord_holder: "", monthly_rent_payment: "" }, }); this.props.history.push('/contact'); } render() { const { loading, data } = this.props.customer; const historydata = [ {},{} ] return (
{/* { loading && Loading... } { !loading && Object.keys(data).length > 0 && {data.name} } */} Sudeep Jain
{/* Demo Purpose */}

) } } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ customer: state.customers.selected }); export default connect( mapStateToProps, { getCustomerById, sendPreapproval, changeCustomer } )(CustomerDetail);
